author: zhoukevin
msg: Given a test case of using java.beans.XMLEncoder.writeObject() to write any object. Of the encoding output, for each line, Oracle JDK6 always ends with a space while HARMONY doesn't. This is a non-bug difference between, but it's nice for HARMONY to have it.
